long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Play more games on the top-left menu.

“Five Nights at Freddy’s” (often abbreviated as FNAF) is a popular indie horror game developed by Scott Cawthon. The game is renowned for its unique blend of horror, strategy, and suspense. Set in a spooky, dimly-lit pizza restaurant named Freddy Fazbear’s Pizza, players take on the role of a night-time security guard who must survive five nights while being stalked by animatronic characters that roam the building at night.

How to Play
The primary goal in FNAF is to survive five nights (each night lasting approximately 8 minutes in real time) without being caught by any of the animatronic characters. Players are confined to a security office and must monitor the restaurant through a network of security cameras. The game involves managing limited power resources, which are consumed by using lights, security doors, and cameras.

Game Controls
Mouse Movement: Look around the office.
Left Mouse Click: Interact with camera feeds, lights, and doors.
Space Bar: (In some versions) Turn on/off the fan or look at different items on the desk.
